channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Black Friday shoppers hit stores across U.S
item.description: The holiday shopping season has begun with stores offering deals and discounts for Black Friday.

item.title: President Biden and first lady to debut AIDS Memorial Quilt at White House
item.description: President Joe Biden and first lady Jill Biden will commemorate World AIDS Day at the White House on Sunday by displaying an AIDS Memorial Quilt on the...

item.title: How sachets are fueling a plastic waste crisis in the Philippines
Can countries agree to "end the world's plastic pollution crisis"?
item.description: The U.S. is among 175 nations haggling over a treaty to reduce the vast quantity of plastic pollution that ends up in our food, water and even our bod...

item.title: Anti-Israel protesters don’t want to save ‘Palestine’. They want to destroy Western civilisation
Passengers stage hunger strike on luxury Antarctica cruise after missing out on dream holiday
Young mother killed after being knocked off e-bike in hit-and-run is named
New Netflix documentary looks at the downsides of overshopping

item.title: "Mornings Memory": Watching TV on your phone
item.description: Watching videos on your phone is second nature now but it wasn't always like that. Back on this day in 2005, Anthony Mason reported on this new trend.

item.title: WATCH: Playful baby kangaroo climbs all over its mom
item.description: A mama kangaroo showed her patience and continued to eat despite the young kangaroo all over her.

item.title: What to know about the Amazon strike planned for Black Friday
item.description: Amazon employees in 20 countries are preparing to protest on Black Friday.

item.title: Syrian rebels breach Aleppo amid surprise offensive
item.description: Videos circulating online appear to show rebels in the outskirts of Aleppo, Syria’s second largest city.

item.title: WATCH: Dog gets puppy sibling to sit for a treat
item.description: Dolly Pawton had to show Mr. Claude how it's done!

item.title: Armed men in speedboats make off with women and children when a migrants' dinghy deflates off Libya
